item.title: Minor outage for pipeline deployment
item.description: Monitoring - After hitting the ole reboot button Example Chat App is now recovering. We’re going to continue to monitor as everyone reconnects. (16:50 UTC — Apr 13) Investigating - We’re aware of users experiencing unavailable guilds and issues when attempting to connect. We’re currently investigating. (15:54 UTC — Apr 13)
item.content:
Monitoring - After hitting the ole reboot button Example Chat App is now recovering. We’re going to continue to monitor as everyone reconnects. (16:50 UTC — Apr 13)

Investigating - We’re aware of users experiencing unavailable guilds and issues when attempting to connect. We’re currently investigating. (15:54 UTC — Apr 13)
